go_data.justification: The pregnane X receptor is a nuclear receptor that shares homologies with the VDR, a known steroid hormone receptor.
The pregnane X receptor is described as a nuclear receptor.

go_data.term: regulation of vitamin D metabolic process
go_data.justification: Binding of anti-epileptic drugs to the pregnane X receptor increases 25(OH)D catabolism by an induction of CYP3A4 and CYP24A1.
The pregnane X receptor binds to anti-epileptic drugs such as phenobarbital, carbamazepine, phenytoin and valproate.
